description: Improve the Capacity of CMWU  for Monitoring the Quality of Water Supply in the Gaza Strip

subproject.description:
The project aim is to improve the monitoring of water supply quality and mitigate the health risk of heavy metals in municipal water supply throughout achieving the following three outputs:
1.	Baseline of heavy metals concentration in Gaza Aquifer is established.
2.	CMWU capacity to monitor the quality of water supply is improved.
3.	Advocacy and public awareness campaigns are conducted
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Improve the Capacity of CMWU

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
